SYSTEM: Ontologies%26multilinguality%40wiki_24-01-08.pdf: Página 4
©Guadalupe Aguado de Cea
4
How can we provide multilinguality? 
Localization vs. internationalization
• Localization involves taking a product and making it 
linguistically and culturally appropriate to the target 
locale (country/region and language) where it will be 
used and sold (LISA)
• In economics: adapting a product to a non-native 
environment.
• In software y web design: adapting contents, 
language, and design to the target language and 
culture
• In ontologies: Ontology Localization involves the 
process of adapting an ontology to a particular 
language and culture.
speaker: SYSTEM
